DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate whether sprayable PEG barrier effective reducing adhesion laparoscopic gynecologic surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Sprayable PEG Barrier Gynecologic Laparoscopy
DOC.criteria: > 18 year Undergoing gynecologic laparoscopy Suspected malignancy Incomplete adhesiolysis initial laparoscopy Pregnancy Lactating Stage IV endometriosis
